Ok well my pk point system is messed up instead of getting points when killing you get points for dying. Heres my code where the points are getting from

client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+"."); killerz.pkPoints += 2; }
